ZetaFish.NetworkObjects
Class ZFPlayer

java.lang.Object
  ZetaFish.NetworkObjects.ZFPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ZFPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

ZFPlayer is used by other Network Object to represent a given player. Design 4.6.8 v1.5

See Also:

Parameters:
PlayerName - Name to use for this player.
